hero.headline: Hey I'm Oscar Salazar
hero.subhead: I’m a full-stack developer with experience working on backend services, web applications, and supporting tools. I enjoy building practical solutions, writing clean and understandable code, and learning through real projects. I’m interested in growing as a developer while contributing to systems that support real business needs.

stats.label: Systems created to detail with specific client requirements

projects.title: Some Projects
projects.subtitle: Practical systems built for real business needs.

items.name: The Coastal Project – Time Tracking & Payroll System
items.description: Custom-built time tracking and payroll management system developed for a short-term rental company in the United States to replace an existing third-party solution.
items.summary: Designed and implemented a custom time tracking platform to replace a third-party system, providing better control over employee hours, payroll processing, and operational reporting for a short-term rental company.
items.impact: Centralized employee time and payroll data, reduced manual payroll processing, and lowered annual software subscription costs by approximately 60%, generating significant operational savings.
highlights: Employee time tracking and shift logging
Payroll receipts and employee payment management
Replacement of a third-party time tracking system
Backend APIs for time, payroll, and reporting modules
Reduced dependency on external SaaS tools

items.name: Mobile App – Institutional Asset Management
items.description: Full-stack mobile application developed to manage, identify, and track institutional assets using mobile devices.
items.summary: Designed and implemented a full-stack Android mobile application to manage institutional assets, allowing users to authenticate securely, identify assets using the mobile device, and synchronize data with a backend system.
items.impact: Improved asset visibility and control by enabling real-time asset identification, offline data access, and centralized synchronization with backend services.
highlights: Mobile device used as an asset identification reader
Data synchronization with backend via REST APIs

items.name: Peter Stone Company – Business Website Migration
items.description: Custom business website developed for a handyman company in the United States, transitioning from a website builder platform to a fully custom-built solution.
items.summary: Designed and built a detailed, custom website to replace a third-party website builder, giving the business full control over content, structure, and performance while better representing its services and brand.
items.impact: Improved site performance, content flexibility, and long-term maintainability by removing dependency on a website builder and implementing a fully custom solution.
highlights: Migration from a website builder to a custom-built website
Fully responsive layout for desktop and mobile
Service-focused content structure tailored to the business
Close collaboration with the business owner

skills.title: What I bring
skills.subtitle: Hands-on full-stack development across backend, frontend, tools, and infrastructure.

items.title: Backend
items.body:
• REST API development with Node.js and Java    
• Business logic and data modeling
• JWT-based authentication and authorization
• PostgreSQL schema design and queries

items.title: Frontend
items.body:
• Responsive UI development with React
• Modern JavaScript and TypeScript
• Component-based architecture
• Usability-focused layouts and interactions

items.title: Tools
items.body:
• Proficient in using AI-powered development tools to improve productivity, debugging, and code quality
• API consumption and data synchronization
• Version control with Git and GitHub
• Collaborative development workflows and code reviews

items.title: Infrastructure
items.body:
• Cloud deployment on DigitalOcean
• Backend service hosting and configuration
• Environment-based application setup
• Basic CI and deployment workflows

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.body: Feel free to reach out. I’m always interested in learning and growing through new experiences.
